where_text: Where are you going on your trip?
예약동의: I have confirmed the reservation details.
예약자알림: Please provide your name as it appears on official documents.
전화번호형식: Please enter a valid phone number
이메일형식: Please enter a valid email address
이용목적내용: Briefly state the purpose of your stay
결제및환불정책동의: I agree to the Payment and Refund Policy
약관동의동의: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
개인정보처리방침동의: I agree to the Privacy Policy
마케팅수신동의: Consent to Receive Marketing Messages via e-mail
마케팅수신동의동의: I agree to receive marketing messages via e-mail
이벤트 및 혜택정보 푸시 알림 허용: Allow Push Notifications for Events and Benefits
이벤트 및 혜택정보 이메일 수신 허용: Allow Email Reception for Events and Benefits
이벤트 및 혜택정보 SMS 수신 허용: Allow SMS Reception for Events and Benefits
시작설명:
Once you've signed up, feel free to choose an overnight or short-term rental option to search for the space you want. Our hashtag search feature helps you find the right space faster and more accurately.
When booking, you can select a calendar by the day or week to make it easy to book.
루미는 어떻게 시작하나요?: How do I get started with Roomi?
루미에서는 숙박과 단기 임대를 어떻게 선택할 수 있나요?: How do I choose between stays and short-term rentals on Roomi?
해시태그 검색 기능을 활용하면 더욱 빠르고 정확하게 취향에 맞는 공간을: Our hashtag search feature helps you find the right space faster and more accurately.
회원가입 후 숙박 또는 단기 임대 옵션을 자유롭게 선택하여 원하는 공간을: Once you've signed up, feel free to choose an overnight or short-term rental option to search for the space you want.
예약 시 일 단위 또는 주 단위로 달력을 선택하여 간편하게 예약을 진행할: When booking, you can select a calendar by the day or week to make it easy to book.
단기임대설명:
Roomi gives you the flexibility to choose and book overnight stays and short-term rentals.
Choose the right option for your purpose and length of stay!
✅ Accommodation (recommended for booking by the day)
•	Suitable for short trips, business trips, and temporary visits
•	A variety of accommodation options including hotels, guesthouses, and residences
•	Recommended for users looking for formal accommodations
✅ Short-term rentals (recommended for weekly or longer contracts)
•	Suitable for longer stays (international students, work vacation, living for a month, etc)
•	Discounts set by the host
•	A variety of short-term rental options, including residential homes, studios, and offices
•	Recommended for users who want a variety of private spaces, such as a home or office
계약설명: We securely record and store all contractual agreements on our servers to serve as evidence of the contract. This gives you the peace of mind that in the event of a dispute, you'll have clear data to resolve the issue.
단위계약설명: Weekly/monthly contracts require a security deposit and a discount set by the host. Weekly/monthly contracts are a more economical option than daily contracts, especially if you're planning a longer stay. The security deposit amount and discount rate can be found on the booking screen.
장점설명: Roomi is a platform that gives you the flexibility to choose between overnight stays and short-term rentals. Our hashtag search feature makes it quick and easy to find the right room, and we offer flexible contracts with weekly and daily booking options. Our system is designed with both hosts and guests in mind, ensuring that everyone is comfortable and happy with the experience. Coming soon, you'll be able to personalize your search experience with our AI recommendation system.
전입신고가 가능한 공간인가요?: Is this a space where I can declare a move?
전입신고내용: Most short-term rentals may not be sublettable, but some may be, so be sure to check with the host before booking if you need to sublet. You can also find this information on the booking screen.
공간을 실제로 보고 계약할 수 있나요?: Can I actually see the space and contract?
공간내용: Some spaces are available for viewing before signing a contract. Check on the booking screen, or contact the host directly via chat for more information.
설명된 계약 조건과 공간 상태가 다르면 어떻게 해야 하나요?: What should I do if the space condition differs from the described contract terms?
계약설명1: If the terms of the contract differ from the actual condition of the space, first notify the host and ask them to resolve it. If we determine that the terms of the contract and the actual space are clearly different, this may be a legitimate reason to cancel the contract. In this case, the host can request to cancel the contract through Rumi. However, please note that odors, noise, cleanliness, brightness of the space, and surroundings, which may be subjective, may not be considered as a reason to cancel the contract. We encourage hosts and guests to communicate and negotiate with each other to resolve any issues smoothly.
원하는 날짜만 골라서 계약할 수 있나요?: Can I just pick and choose the dates I want to contract?
날짜내용: On Roomi, you can contract for as little as one week or as many days as you like (for weekly contracts, you can only contract for 7 consecutive days, and for monthly contracts, you can contract in default 30-day increments). Weekly and monthly contracts require a security deposit, which is applied in the amount set by the host. Also, weekly contracts may be eligible for discounts depending on the host, so check the booking screen.
입주 후 시설 고장이 생기면 어떻게 해야 하나요?: What if there's a facility breakdown after I move in?
입주설명:
If you experience a breakdown or inconvenience, first notify the host immediately. While the host is ultimately responsible for any defects or issues in the space, good communication and cooperation with the host can help resolve issues faster.
 - If consumables (light bulbs, batteries, etc.) need replacing, you may be responsible for doing so yourself.
 - If damage to the space is caused by guest negligence, you may be charged additional fees.
계약 취소는 어떻게 하나요?: How do I cancel my contract?
취소설명1: You can cancel your contract directly from [Contract History], but be sure to check the host's refund policy before canceling, as it may vary depending on the space you've contracted.
계약 취소는 언제까지 가능한가요?: How long can I cancel my contract?
취소설명2: You can cancel the contract before  am 00:00 on the day of move-in, but you cannot cancel after am 00:00 on the day of move-in, so please take care of it in advance if you want to cancel.
중도 퇴실 시 환불 규정은 어떻게 되나요?: What is the refund policy if I leave early?
퇴실설명1: Roomi follows the host's refund policy for early departures. You can request a refund of your security deposit by requesting to leave, which can be done through the [Contract details > Request to leave and request security deposit return] process. After checking out, your security deposit will be returned within 2-3 business days, subject to verification by the host. However, refunds for the remainder of the stay may vary depending on the host's policy, so be sure to check the refund policy before booking.
계약 날짜를 변경할 수 있나요?: Can I change my contract date?
계약날짜규정:
Changes to the contract date can only be made within the same period. Additional payments or refunds are not supported.
Rescheduling is possible if it's agreed upon between the guest and host, and you'll need to contact us through the in-app Help Center to apply the changed dates to the contract. However, if the change is not required to be reflected in the contract, it can be agreed upon between the guest and host.
법인카드나 해외카드로 결제가 가능한가요?: Can I pay with a corporate or international card?
Yes, Roomi supports both corporate and international card payments.
현금영수증을 받을 수 있나요?: Can I get a cash receipt?
현금영수증내용:
<Issuing receipts for space rental fees>
Space rentals are exempt from VAT, which means that you're not allowed to issue an electronic tax invoice or cash receipt. Instead, you can ask your host for a simplified receipt if you need one.
However, if the host is registered as a general business (e.g., a hotel), you can issue a cash receipt or e-tax invoice.
<Issuing a receipt for payment fees>
Payment fees incurred when using the Lumi platform are subject to VAT. You can request or download a receipt from the [Manage Booking] tab after payment.
영수증 발급은 어떻게 하나요?: How do I issue a receipt?
일반영수증내용: After payment, you can download your receipt from the Manage Booking tab in the app or request it by email. If you need a receipt or tax invoice issued in your company's name, please contact our support team.
루미 결제 수수료는 무엇인가요?: What are the Roomi payment fees?
수수료내용:
Roomi payment fees are the costs incurred to operate the reliable booking service and convenient payment system offered through the platform. These fees are used to support the various features and services that Rumi provides to help users enter into contracts smoothly and securely.
 The fees are transparent and visible at the checkout stage. This way, we can focus on providing the best experience for both guests and hosts!
보증금 설명1: On Roomi, security deposits may apply to both stays and short-term rentals at the option of the host. If a security deposit is applied, the amount set by the host will be charged at the time of booking to ensure that the space is safe and the contract is fair. It's up to the host to decide if a security deposit applies, and some listings can be booked with no security deposit.
보증금 설명2: Security deposits are set by the host of each space and can vary depending on the space's conditions or characteristics. The amount of the security deposit is detailed on the booking screen.
보증금 설명3: At the end of the contract, the security deposit will be refunded once the host confirms your departure. The refund method may vary depending on the payment method: if you paid by card, it will be refunded to your card, or if you paid by bank transfer, it will be credited to the account you entered.
보증금 설명4: If your security deposit hasn't been returned within 48 hours of checking out, please contact us immediately via the in-app customer center. We'll check the issue and take care of it quickly.
보증금 설명5: In case of early departure, the amount will be returned after confirmation from the host and deducted based on the length of stay. If you plan to leave before the end of the contract, please coordinate with your host to ensure a smooth transition.
보증금 설명6: If you damage the space during your stay or otherwise violate the terms of the agreement, the amount may be deducted from your security deposit. However, as long as you follow good move-in etiquette, your host will return your security deposit in full once they've inspected the space.
보증금을 모두 받지 못하는 경우가 있나요?: What if I don't get my full security deposit?
보증금은 어떤 경우에 필요한가요?: When is a security deposit required?
보증금 금액은 어떻게 결정되나요?: How is the security deposit amount determined?
보증금 반환은 어떻게 이루어지나요?: How is the security deposit returned?
보증금 반환이 지연될 경우 어떻게 해야 하나요?: What should I do if there is a delay in returning my security deposit?
중도 퇴실 시 보증금은 어떻게 처리되나요?: What happens to the security deposit if I leave early?
부가설명1: Yes, Roomi can be contracted by the day and by the week. Weekly contracts require a security deposit, which is set by the host. Weekly contracts may also come with discounts, depending on the host.
부가설명2:
Accommodation: Ideal for people who want to book hotels, guesthouses, and certified listings.
Short-term rentals: Ideal for people who want to rent out a regular residential space, such as a studio or office, for a set period of time.
 💡 Hosts can choose to operate as either an accommodation or short-term rental when signing up, and guests can book either way.
부가설명3:
We'll be introducing an AI recommendation system that analyzes your booking patterns, preferences, and travel goals to recommend personalized spaces for you.
We'll continue to develop and improve the system so that you can quickly find spaces that better suit your tastes.
부가설명4: You can communicate directly with hosts through our chat feature. We'll quickly resolve your questions before and after booking.
지원언어설명:
Our service supports all of the following languages 
- Simplified Chinese 🇨🇳\ 
- Traditional Chinese 🇹🇼\ 
- Japanese 🇯🇵\ 
- English 🇺🇸\ 
- Thai 🇹🇭\ 
- Vietnamese 🇻🇳\ 
- Russian 🇷🇺\ 
- Mongolian 🇲🇳\ 
- Indonesian 🇮🇩\ 
- Arabic 🇸🇦\ 
We will add more languages in phases.
루미에서는 원하는 기간에 따라 계약을 유연하게 선택할 수 있나요?: Does Roomi give me the flexibility to choose a contract for any length of time?
루미에서는 숙박과 단기 임대가 구분되어 있나요?: Does Roomi differentiate between overnight stays and short-term rentals?
루미의 AI 추천 시스템은 무엇인가요?: What is Roomi's AI recommendation system?
호스트와의 소통은 어떻게 하나요?: How do I communicate with hosts?
언어설정 가이드: Initially, the browser language is automatically applied, but you can change it to your desired language at any time below.
이벤트 및 혜택정보 푸시 알림 수신 허용: allow push notifications for events and offers
이벤트 및 혜택정보 SMS 수신 허용: allow sms for events and offers
이벤트 및 혜택정보 이메일 수신 허용: allow emails for events and offers
For faster support, contact us through our Kakaotalk channel.
전 세계 게스트와 연결되는 루미: Find your space, anywhere with Roomi
even in korea where deposits are high, you can find a place with a lower deposit.
unlike traditional monthly or yearly leases, you can stay for as little as one week.
thanks to translation support, foreigners can easily find homes and communicate comfortably.
여권과 얼굴 인증으로 빠른 확인: Quick Verification with Passport and Face ID
종합 시설 관리 서비스 비용 (인터넷, 운영비 포함)\n청소 서비스, 보:
Includes monthly maintenance, internet, water, and electricity
Includes maintenance, cleaning, security services, and facility upkeep
Includes basic maintenance, shared space upkeep, 24-hour security service
Includes maintenance, heating/cooling, elevator upkeep, and parking management
Includes all maintenance, internet, and common facility usage fees
전자금융거래 이용약관에 동의합니다. (필수):
I agree to the Electronic Financial Transaction Terms.
(Required)
결제 취소 및 환불 규정에 동의합니다. (필수):
I agree to the Cancellation and Refund Policy.
(Required)
개인정보 제3자 제공에 동의합니다. (필수):
I agree to the provision of personal information to third parties.
(Required)
마케팅 이메일 수신에 동의합니다. (선택):
I agree to receive marketing emails.
(Optional)
중도 퇴실 시 환불 정책에 따라 환불 금액이 결정됩니다. 자세한 내용은: Refund amount will be determined based on the refund policy. Please contact the host for more details.
에 중도 퇴실하시겠습니까?: - Would you like to check out early?
로그아웃 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to log out?
